title: Haven't received second icon yet

replies.body: the blitz icon said it can take up to 2 weeks to receive. for the start guardian its probably too late. best shot is writing a ticket to the riot games support. they always ask for the topic of the ticket. if you cant find a fitting one just take any they can redirect the ticket.

Timethief49 stealing my thunder again ^_^!

As he said, the icon for the [**Advanced AI Bots**](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/03/dev-do-bots-dream-of-electric-poros/) will be going out over the next few weeks. If you still aren't seeing it in a couple weeks, reach out to us in a ticket.

The [**Star Guardian icon**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/star-guardian-skins-now-live) promotion is no longer going on, however. That icon was given out during an event that was available until Oct 20th 2016.
